content: hady the hippo amigurumi with a bikini suit is about 11 5″ tall in standing pose and about 9″ tall when it is sitting down crochet from dk lightweight acrylic yarn by using 2 5mm hook it is a great size as a huggable softie hence it is absolutely lovely to make for children as a gift **materials** **hippo** 2 5mm hook acrylic yarn in pink and white colors polyester fiberfill 10mm dome-button eye 1 pair **bikini suit** 2 5mm hook acrylic yarn in green color small button **tools** darning needle long fabric marker water erasable scissors pins **abbreviations** chain chain single_crochet single_crochet increase 2sc incresase inv decrease invisible decrease 2sctog 2sc together normal decreasing stitch double_crochet double_crochet **instructions** crochet all parts by following the crochet patterns stated below stuff the parts as instructed for head sew dome-button eyes at round 24 18 sts apart followed by the ears to the head about 8 rounds behind the eyes then sew teeth to the wide muzzle of the hippo at 3rd rounds to the bottom 4th rounds to the side followed by sewing the lip line and the nostril sew body to the head followed by sewing arms feet and tail to the body to complete the hippo amigurumi
